column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column6: na Ammonfo binom ka hɔn ho
column7: baa Jehosafat do dɛ wɔnye no robɔko."

column2: "Nna obi bae bɛkaa kyerɛɛ Jehosafat dɛ
column3: Dɔmtutuw bi fi po no egya fi Siria reba wo do; na

column2: "Na Jehosafat suroi
column3: na ɔdze n’enyi sii do dɛ ɔbɔhwehwɛ EWURADZE; na ɔbɔɔ mbuadadzi ho dawur wɔ Juda nyinara mu."

column2: "Na Juda poon hɔnho hyiae
column3: dɛ wɔrobɔhwehwɛ EWURADZE hɔ mboa: mekyerɛ wofi Juda nkurow nyinara mu na wɔbaa dɛ wɔrobɔhwehwɛ EWURADZE."

column2: "Na Jehosafat gyinaa Juda na Jerusalɛm bagua no mu
column3: wɔ EWURADZE ne fi no mu

column2: "na ɔsee dɛ
column5: ana ɔwo nnyɛ Nyankopɔn wɔ ɔsor? Ana nnyɛ ɔwo nye amanaman ahendzi nyinara do ɔhwɛfo bi a? Wo nsamu na tum na mbanyinndam wɔ
column6: ma dɛm ntsi obi runntum nngyina w’enyim."

column2: "Ana nnyɛ ɔwo
column4: na ituu asaase yi do atsefo no fii wo man Israel enyim
column5: na edze maa wo nyɛnko Abraham daa no bi a?"

column2: "Na wɔtsenaa do
column3: na wosii wo do krɔnkrɔnbea maa wo dzin
column10: anaa ɔkɔm ba hɛn do a
column13: (osiandɛ wo dzin wɔ ofi yi mu
column14: ) na yeesu afrɛ wo wɔ hɛn amandzehu mu
column15: na ɔwo etsie hɛn na agye hɛn nkwa."

column2: "Na afei
column5: na Moab na Seir bepɔw mba no a ɔwoara ammpɛ ma Israel annkɔ hɔn ntuae
column6: aber a wofi Egypt asaase do reba no
column7: na mbom wɔdanee fii hɔn ho

column2: "hwɛ
column4: dɛ wɔaba rubotu hɛn efi w’enyadze a ɔwoara edze ama hɛn dɛ yendzi no do."

column2: "Hɛn Nyankopɔn e
column3: ana innkobu hɔn atsɛn? Osiandɛ yennyi tum bi a yɛdze rigyina kuw kɛse yi a wɔreba hɛn do yi enyim; nkyii so yennyim dza yɛnnyɛ: na ɔwoara na hɛn enyi da wo do."

column2: "Na Juda nyinara
"Nna EWURADZE no sunsum baa Jahaziel
column7: Levinyi a ofi Asaf mba no mu no do wɔ mboanofo no finimfin;"

column2: "na ɔsee dɛ
column6: na ɔwo ɔhen Jehosafat: mbrɛ EWURADZE se hom nye yi
column8: nkyii so mma hom akoma nntu osian nyimpadodow kɛse yi ntsi; osiandɛ ɔko yi nnyɛ homdze bi a

column2: "Ɔkyena hom nsian nkɔ hɔn do; hwɛ
column3: wɔnam Ziz afowee rofow aba; na hom bohu hɔn wɔ bɔnsa no n’ewiei

column2: "Onnkehia hom dɛ hom bɔko wɔ ɔko yi mu: hom nhuruhuruw ngyina
column4: na wɔnhwɛ EWURADZE a ɔka hom ho no
column6: Juda na Jerusalɛm e: mma hom nnsuro na hom akoma nntu so: ɔkyena hom mfir edzi nkɔ hɔn do; na EWURADZE bedzi hom ekyir."

column2: "Na Jehosafat bɔɔ ne tsir adze dze n’enyim kaa famu: na Juda nyinara na Jerusalɛm atsefo no hwehwee famu wɔ EWURADZE enyim sɔɔr EWURADZE."
"Na Levifo a wofi Kohatfo mba
column4: soɛree gyinagyinaa dɛ wɔdze ndze kɛse mbordo riyi EWURADZE

column2: "Na wɔsoɛɛr anapaatu
column3: na wofiir edzi kɔr Tekoa sar no do: na worifir edzi akɔ no
column7: hom ntsie me; hom ngye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ndzi
column8: na hom betsim; hom ngye no nkɔnhyɛfo no ndzi

column2: "Na aber a ɔnye ɔman no faa apam no
column3: nna ɔhyehyɛɛ hɔn a wɔntow ndwom mma EWURADZE
column4: na wonyi no ayɛw wɔ n’ahokeka krɔnkrɔn mu
column5: aber a worifir edzi wɔ dɔm no enyim no
column7: Hom nda EWURADZE ase; na n’ehumbɔbɔr tsim hɔ daa."

column2: "Na aber a wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrotow ndwom na woriyi ayɛw no nna EWURADZE maa atsɛweefo baa Ammonmba
column4: na Seir bepɔw do atsefo a wɔbaa Juda do no do; na wɔbɔɔ hɔn gui."

column2: "Na Ammon na Moabmba no soɛree tsiaa Seir bepɔw do atsefo no
column3: dɛ woruku hɔn asɛɛ hɔn pasapasa: na aber a wowiee Seir atsefo no
column4: obiara boae ma wɔsɛɛ obi so."

column2: "Na aber a Juda baa sar no do ahwɛɛtsentsen no nkyɛn no
column3: nna wɔdanee hwɛɛ nyimpadodow no; na
column6: na obiara nnyi hɔ a ofii nsa guanee."

column2: "Na aber a Jehosafat na no nkorɔfo no baa dɛ wɔrebɛfa hɔn asadze no
column3: nna wohunii wɔ hɔn mu ahonyadze na ntar
column4: na ndwindze a ɔsom bo piigyan a hɔnara wɔtasee fae
column5: ɔso ma dɛ wobotum asoa akɔ: na wɔdze asadze no fom araa ndaansa

column2: "Na da a otsia anan no wɔpoon hɔnho hyiae wɔ Beraka bɔnsa no mu; osiandɛ hɔ na wohyiraa EWURADZE: dɛm ntsi na wɔfrɛɛ no Beraka Bɔnsa
"Nna wɔsanee
column5: dɛ wɔdze enyigye reba Jerusalɛm bio; osiandɛ EWURADZE ama hɔn enyi agye wɔ hɔn atamfo ho."

column2: "Na wɔdze bɛnta asanku na nsankutsen na mbɛn bae bɛhɛɛn EWURADZE fie wɔ Jerusalɛm."
"Na Nyankopɔn ho suro kaa ɔman no mu ahendzi no nyinara
column3: wɔ aber a wɔtsee dɛ EWURADZE nye Israel hɔn atamfo ako no."

column2: "Nna Jehosafat n’ahenman mu dwee: osiandɛ ne Nyankopɔn maa no ahomgye wɔ mbea nyinara hyiae."
"Na Jehosafat dzii hen wɔ Juda do: aber a ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduasa enum; na odzii hen mfe eduonu enum wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Azuba
"Na ɔnantseew n’egya Asa kwan do
column4: dɛ ɔyɛɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do."

column2: "Mbom mbea sorɔnsorɔm no dze oennyiyi no hɔ; nkyii so nna ɔman no nnyae mmfaa hɔn akoma mmaa hɔn egyanom Nyankopɔn no."
"Afei Jehosafat no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: kan dze na ekyir dze no
column5: wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Hanani ne ba Jehu n’abakɔsɛm a wɔdze hyɛɛ Israel ahemfo nwoma no mu no mu."

column2: "Na iyi ekyir na Judahen Jehosafat dze noho kɔbɔɔ Israelhen Ahazia ho; ɔnoara na ɔyɛɛ ndzeyɛbɔn dodow no:"
"na ɔdze noho bɔɔ no ho dɛ wɔbɛyɛ ahɛn akɔ Tarsis: na wɔyɛɛ ahɛn no Ezion-geber."
"Nna Dodavahu a ofi Maresa no ne ba Eliezer hyɛɛ Jehosafat ho nkɔm
column4: Osiandɛ ɔwo edze woho abɔ Ahazia ho ntsi
column5: EWURADZE asekyɛw wo ndwuma. Na ahɛn no bobɔe
